overview: Hot older/younger couple Michael Roman and JD Phoenix are celebrating their anniversary in a quaint hotel by the sea. But when JD notices sexy bear Jaxton Wheeler alone in the lounge, he can't help but take notice -- much to his lover, Michael's dismay. As JD's attraction for Jaxton continues to grow, Michael's frustration intensifies. Is it possible to have two hot daddies without losing them both?
title: Daddy Dilemma
